resources.string: You are the light of my eyes.
Each day I feel like I have stronger and stronger feelings for you!
I cannot stop thinking about you even a second
I have so much to be grateful to your mum cuz she gave birth to u.
Good things are always coming into my life when you are around.
I have the courage to follow my heart whenever I see you.
You make me enjoy my life to the fullest.
Your smell is the only air I want to breathe for the rest of my life.
Lets run away like two capybaras on the fields.
